page.title: 15 POLICE TRAFFIC H.Q.
page.content: The Police Headquarters in Balunie Drive opened in 1982. It is the traffic control centre for the Central Division of Tayside Police. This means that it garages all police vehicles from motor cycles to police vans. They say that Saturday is the most busy day of the week. Every year they get new vehicles if any have been in crashes they then get replaced by new ones. They work 24 hours and have three shifts. Many people work at the police station. There is also a building for the training of new recruits.
